abstract: China’s Qingdao Haier is advancing its interest in General Electric‘s appliance business and has begun to approach investment banks for the advisory assignment, The Financial Times reported citing an unnamed source.
lead_paragraph: China’s Qingdao Haier is advancing its interest in General Electric‘s appliance business and has begun to approach investment banks for the advisory assignment, The Financial Times reported citing an unnamed source.

headline.main: Haier Said to Move Forward With G.E. Appliances Interest
